briefdescription.para: Output Data published at the end of cycle.
CFS PWM Motor Controller Task (MAC) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: CFS PWM Motor Controller Task application entry point. This function performs app initialization, then waits for the cFE ES Startup Sync, then executes the RPR main processing loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the CFS PWM Motor Controller (MAC) application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: PWM Motor Controller application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) MAC data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the MAC application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by MAC application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the MAC application data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the MAC application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Receive and process messages from the scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives and processes messages for the MAC application from the SCH pipe. This function will pend for the type defined by iBlocking, allowing it to wait for messages, i.e. wakeup messages from scheduler.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

briefdescription.para: PWM Motor Controller Task incoming data processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming data subscribed by MAC application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: PWM Motor Controller Task incoming command processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming commands subscribed by MAC application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: PWM Motor Controller Task application commands.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes command messages specific to the MAC application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sends the housekeeping message

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function publishes the actuator output message containing the commanding values to the motors.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function verifies the command message length.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message

simplesect.para: if the message length matches expectations, FALSE if it does not.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function initializes MAC's configuration tables. This includes the PWM and the Mixer configuration table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Obtain MAC configuration tables data pointers.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function manages the configuration tables and obtains a pointer to their data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function cycles the attitude controller

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function copies params from the table into local data structures required for use

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function calculates the attitude setpoint

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function calculates the rates required to meet the attitude setpoint

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function adjusts the rates based on the current throttle value

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
of adjusted rates

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function validates MAC's PWM configuration table

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the table to validate.
